channel.title: Projects on Website of Brendon Votteler

item.title: A Note on This Space
item.description:
This space will hold future projects. And I might share a few past projects, too.
Regarding the latter, I’m in contact with former employers to find out if they can allow me to share information about interesting past projects. (And if so, how much I can safely share.)

Since a lot of my past work was for my employers' clients, this can be tricky. We need to take into account their respective agreements, too.
I can’t make promises about what I will be able to share, but when I get permission, I’ll only share the ones that have enough “meat” after review to be valuable for my readers.
